name: Bootstrap Colors System for the Picostrap WordPress theme
description:
A useful color design file to generate Bootstrap color variable set.


Behind this file

picostrap in a a 100% free and GPL Bootstrap 5 WordPress Starter Theme / sass playground.


It's built focusing on a zero bloat philosophy, and removing all WP extra tags to "bring" the page as similar as possible at the original minimalistic Bootstrap 5 documentation examples to allow for great performance and pagespeed results, but it's most peculiar aspect is that it has a built-in php SCSS compiler, merged with the simple Customizer interface.


It will also process your sassy CSS code automatically, watching your /sass folder inside the theme.

No need to install command line tools. It has a Livereload feature too.


How to Download picostrap

Please browse -> https://picostrap.com/ to download picostrap WP theme or to watch our demos.


picostrap is proudly built by the LiveCanvas team.


Why we're developing this file?

This file helps you to build a bootstrap color variable set, by using figma and its several plugin/addons as the main playground.

This kit has been essentially designed to generate Bootstrap color scheme; the file has been bundled with the “traditional” 12 basic Bootstrap variables: $primary, $secondary, $danger, $body-bg etc... hoping to extend to any given Bootstrap 5 variables.


Guide / Instructions

Open the Colors page and follows those directions.
